title: Prawn cocktail on mixed greens
ingredients: ['150g light mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons brandy', '2 teaspoons ketchup', 'salt and freshly milled black pepper', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh dill', '500g small cooked, shelled and deveined prawns', '6 medium white mushrooms, trimmed and thinly sliced', '6 red radishes, trimmed and thinly sliced', '1 hard-boiled egg, sliced (optional)', '4 handfuls mixed greens (mesclun mix)']
